description:
Aioria begins to have about Pope Arles’s motives as he is told the story behind the alledged betrayal of his brother Aioros. He asks Saori to show proof that she is Athena. Seiya catches the Lightning Bolt fired by Aioria, a feat believed to be impossible for a Bronze Saint…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突! ゴールドセイント
